translations: v．屈尊，俯就：表现出优越感，对某人或某事表现出高人一等的态度。
· He condescended to give me some advice.

sentences.sentence: We had to wait almost an hour before he condescended to see us.
sentences.translation: 我们等了几乎一小时他才屈尊大驾来见我们。

sentences.sentence: When he condescended to speak, he contradicted himself three or four times in the space of half an hour.
sentences.translation: 当他屈尊讲话时，半小时内有三四次前后矛盾。

sentences.sentence: Colin frowned and condescended to look at Mary.
sentences.translation: 科林皱着眉头，屈尊看着她。
